article_title: Refaat Alareer: Palestinians mourn writer killed in strike
sentence: Palestinians  are  mourning  the  death  of  well-known  writer  and  literary  scholar  Refaat  Alareer,  who  was  killed  in  an  air  strike  in  Gaza  City  on  Wednesday.

article_title: Refaat Alareer: Palestinians mourn writer killed in strike

article_title: Refaat Alareer: Palestinians mourn writer killed in strike
sentence: "My  heart  is  broken,  my  friend  and  colleague  Refaat  Alareer  was  killed  with  his  family,"  Gazan  poet  Mosab  Abu  Toha  wrote  on  social  media.
